price: 15. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha falay, waxaa lagu maamuusi beer (Janno) gudaheed iyagoo faraxsan.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥ'barūna
